document.full_text: russia's investigative committee announced that it had enough evidence to prove that rustam makhmudov, a fugitive arrested in chechnya on tuesday, was hired to kill the journalist anna politkovskaya.
document.title: europe: russia: charges in reporter's killing
lines_and_colors: russia's investigative committee announced that it had enough evidence to prove that rustam makhmudov, a fugitive arrested in chechnya on tuesday, was hired to kill the journalist anna politkovskaya.
